quoteText:
Dailymotion may, in its sole discretion, modify these Terms from time to time, and You agree to be bound by such modifications.
Although we may attempt to notify You when major changes are made to these Terms, You should periodically review the most up-to-date version which shall always be accessible from the homepage of the Dailymotion website
title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
